author: CBS News
title: Navy ID's first active-duty member to die of coronavirus
description: Charles Robert Thacker Jr., 41, died 11 days after his captain was fired for pressing the Navy for greater action to safeguard his crew from the virus
content: The crew member of the aircraft carrier USS Theodore Roosevelt who died of the coronavirus was a sailor from Arkansas, the Navy disclosed on Thursday. In a statement, the Navy said Aviation Ordnanceman Chief Petty Officer Charles Robert Thacker Jr., 41, of Fo… [+2604 chars]
